title: Ice box cake
description: This cake is made up of homemade coffee biscuits piled into layers with ginger syrup and cream to hold it all together.Equipment and preparation: you will need a 7cm/2¾in diameter plain biscuit cutter and a 25cm/9in round cake board.
ingredients: 4 tbsp chicory and coffee essence, such as Camp
1 tbsp chicory and coffee essence, such as Camp
